name: Cyber Blast 2
overview: "Cyber Blast 2" is another piece of Amiga code that cannot be found in the depths of the Internet. The game was created many years ago and was released.. A sad curiosity is the fact that only one person registered the game, although it must be admitted that the production is quite interesting and impeccably made. Benedykt Dziubałtowski obtained permission from the author of the game to publish it, thanks to which in the 21st century we can feel the taste of the early nineties with our Amiga. In the labyrinths of corridors player can shoot the horrible monsters in a very Doom\Hired Guns like way.
